metadata.name: Sarah Mitchell Headshot
metadata.notes: Photorealistic headshot for Sarah Mitchell (Senior PPC Manager, 20s)

theme.concept: professional business headshot of an energetic woman in her late 20s with friendly expression

composition.visual_flow: focused on subject with natural eye contact

colors.distribution: natural skin tones with professional business attire in teal or blue, soft neutral background

style.texture: photographic quality with natural skin texture

elements.foreground: professional woman in her late 20s, bright friendly smile, medium-length hair, modern business professional attire
elements.midground: upper body and shoulders in professional clothing
elements.background: soft neutral gray or cool white backdrop, slightly out of focus
